text: Di baahi di gowaa dela i bahi i dai Jordan la ne wanga gi hunu madahaanau i nia dama a tama daane madua a Joseph go Manasseh. Machir, dela dana dama daane go Gilead, la tama daane madua ni Manasseh, gei mee tangada dauwa maaloo, malaa nia gowaa go Gilead mo Bashan ala i bahi i dua Jordan, la ne wanga gi mee.
